item.title: Debugging ISLE Local with PHPStorm
item.description: For the past couple of years I’ve been working in Digital.Grinnell to remove as much “customization” as I can. The effort is coming along, but still, there’s a long way to go. Every now and then I come across a feature that we just can’t live without, and it’s in times like those that I turn to PHPStorm for development and testing. Unfortunately, I’ve been operating without PHPStorm in ISLE because I worried that configuring the PHPStorm debugger in a Docker environment would be a time-consuming, tall task. It was tricky, but worry no more!
